00027 #include "HDTLoader.h"

00030 HDTLoader::HDTLoader() {
00031 }
00032 
00037 bool HDTLoader::load(char* location) {
00038     DataTime t1, t2;
00039     getTime(&t1);
00040 
00041     cout.precision(4);
00042 
00043     cout << "[" << showpoint << t1.user - t1.user << "]  Loading HDT" << endl;
00044 
00045     getTime(&t2);
00046     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Reading Header"
00047             << endl;
00048     header = new Header();
00049     header->read(location);
00050 
00051     getTime(&t2);
00052     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Loading Dictionary"
00053             << endl;
00054 
00055     int mapping = header->getMapping();
00056 
00057     if ((mapping != MAPPING1) && (mapping != MAPPING2))
00058         cout << "   <ERROR> Mapping " << mapping << " is not supported" << endl;
00059 
00060     dictionary = new PlainDictionary(location, mapping,
00061             header->getD_separator(), header->getNsubjects(),
00062             header->getNpredicates(), header->getNobjects(),
00063             header->getSsubobj());
00064 
00065     getTime(&t2);
00066     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Loading Console"
00067             << endl;
00068     switch (header->getT_encoding()) {
00069     case PLAIN:
00070         triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(),
00071                 header->getParsing(), location);
00072         break;
00073     case COMPACT:
00074         triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(),
00075                 header->getParsing(), location);
00076         break;
00077     case BITMAP:
00078         triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(),
00079                 header->getParsing(), location);
00080         break;
00081     case K2TREE:
00082         cout
00083                 << "   <WARNING> K2-tree Triples encoding is not currently supported"
00084                 << endl;
00085         return false;
00086         break;
00087     default:
00088         cout << "   <ERROR> Current triples encoding  is not supported" << endl;
00089         return false;
00090     }
00091 
00092     return true;
00093 }
00094 
00098 void HDTLoader::console() {
00099     triples->console();
00100 }
00101 
00107 void HDTLoader::serialize(char *output, char *format) {
00108     triples->serialize(output, format);
00109 }
00110 
00112 HDTLoader::~HDTLoader() {
00113     delete header;
00114 }
